name: Chalkboard
description:
These hand-painted chalkboards come in a range of 10 fun colours and are decorated with white polka dots!

Each board measures 30cms x 30cms square and is painted with a layer of glaze to protect it from sticky fingers!  The chalkboard area is the shape of a circle.

These are great for young children right through to teenagers, and can be mounted on a wall or door, or just picked up and drawn on!

Please email info@rocketandfairydust.co.uk to discuss your requirements, or add a message when you checkout.

All packages will be carefully wrapped and sent First Class.  There is a flat rate for postage of £2.50.  We aim to get all orders sent out within 14 days, please state clearly if you need the item sooner.  Please enter promo code NOPOSTAGE at checkout if you can collect your goodies from South Merstham.

If for any reason you are not happy please get in touch and we will do our best to sort it out for you.

name: 'No Girls / Boys Allowed' Hanging Door Sign
description:
Perfect to keep brothers and sisters out of each others rooms!  Choice of colours, please choose form the drop down menu!

Please email info@rocketandfairydust.co.uk to discuss your requirements, or add a message when you checkout.

The sign is painted using high quality acrylics, and coated with glaze to protect it from sticky fingers!  They are 9cms high and 22cms wide and have a wire hanging loop.

All packages will be carefully wrapped and sent First Class.  There is a flat rate for postage of £2.50.  We aim to get all orders sent out within 14 days, please state clearly if you need the item sooner.  Please enter promo code NOPOSTAGE at checkout if you can collect your goodies from South Merstham.

If for any reason you are not happy please get in touch and we will do our best to sort it out for you.

name: 'Wine Makes Mummy Clever' Hanging Sign
description:
I bet you know someone who needs this sign hanging in their home!  Available in either turquoise or hot pink, and decorated with white polka dots.

The sign is painted using high quality acrylics, and coated with glaze to protect it from sticky fingers!  They are 9cms high and 22cms wide and have a wire hanging loop.

All packages will be carefully wrapped and sent First Class.  There is a flat rate for postage of £2.50. name: Hanging Owl
description:
These cute little hanging owls are handmade from scraps of fabric left over from other projects!  They are approximately 15cms tall and hang from an elastic loop.  They have felt wings and beaks and button eyes.

Not suitable for children under 36 months due to small parts. 

You can specify which main colour you want, but as all the owls are individually made I can't guarantee that your owl will look exactly like the owls in the photo!

Please email info@rocketandfairydust.co.uk to discuss your requirements, or add a message when you checkout.

All packages will be carefully wrapped and sent First Class.  There is a flat rate for postage of £2.50.  We aim to get all orders sent out within 14 days, please state clearly if you need the item sooner.  Please enter promo code NOPOSTAGE at checkout if you can collect your goodies from South Merstham.

If for any reason you are not happy please get in touch and we will do our best to sort it out for you.

name: Spotty Hanging Hearts
description:
These fun hanging hearts are painted in a range of 10 colours and decorated with white polka dots!  For an extra £2.00 I can add one name to one side of the heart.

Please email info@rocketandfairydust.co.uk to discuss your requirements, or add a message when you checkout.

The hearts are painted using high quality acrylics, and coated with glaze to protect it from sticky fingers!  They are 12cms high and 12cms wide and have a wire hanging loop.

All packages will be carefully wrapped and sent First Class.  There is a flat rate for postage of £2.50.  We aim to get all orders sent out within 14 days, please state clearly if you need the item sooner.  Please enter promo code NOPOSTAGE at checkout if you can collect your goodies from South Merstham.
